content.question: Which of the following is a direct economic consequence that would likely occur if an area of forest was clear-cut so that a housing development can be built?

choices.label: A decrease in the number of game hunting licenses purchased
A decrease in atmospheric oxygen concentration
An increase in taxes from ecotourism
An increase in legislation to regulate stream flow

content.answer: A decrease in the number of game hunting licenses purchased

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
